Class Graph

java.lang.Object
Graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphInterface<Town,Road>
public class Graph extends Object implements GraphInterface<Town,Road>
A graph which stores data of vertices and edges, and has the capabilities of performing many different operations and finding information about the graph.
Author:
Ethan Price
